title: Bears-Pats recap & best coaching jobs (w/Bill Barnwell)
itunes:title: Bears-Pats recap & best coaching jobs (w/Bill Barnwell)
description:
Gregg Rosenthal and Bill Barnwell recap the Monday Night Football matchup between the Chicago Bears and New England Patriots. Then, Bill and Gregg list their favorite and most impressive coaching jobs so far this NFL season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
